string.text: Ratman's PDA
Unknown man
According to Ratman, this is one of Borov's PDAs. But it doesn't turn on. It's broken. Who knows what secrets are hidden on it?
According to Frol, a warehouse with weapons was around here somewhere... Most likely it got looted a long time ago.
Homemade vodka
There used to be this one "enterpreneur" in the Zone. Tried to sell cheap vodka. Now he's in the afterlife, regretting his greed.
Radioactive bread
Used to be normal bread... Now it's radioactive... Can be consumed if you're tired of living.
Hey, bro, you doin' good? Wanna chat?
Not bad, you? Chat about what?
Not much, just talk shit over a drink.
Well, sure, pour me one.
Fuck off, I don't drink with just anyone.
Go fuck yourself then!
Bottoms up...
Shit, we're out of nectar...
Oo-oof... Good shit... Some salo would be great about now...
So, bro... Hear an-n-ything interesting lately?

I'll only tell this to you, bratan... I found a PDA on a corpse not long ago. Had some notes on it about a hidden stash. I'm too damn lazy to get it myself, and you look like an okay guy, so you can have it.
What are you on about, man? There's nothing interesting around here, this ain't Rio-de-Zhytomyr... Nothing but boring shit around here!
I'll go check it out if I have nothing else to do.
Right, then. Call me if you have anything.
How's life, man? Got time to chat?
Sure thing... Kick back, relax.
Seriously, I'd go for some proper meat right now. On skewers, and fried...
Just pour the drinks, we'll find some meat, don't worry.
Fuck off, I don't drink with just anyone.
Go fuck yourself then!
Bottoms up, then. To our guys...
Nah, man, if only I had some...
To our guys, yeah...
Hey, have anything interesting to tell, perhaps?

Interesting, huh? Heard some talk at one of our meeting places, supposedly about an unlooted stash. I'm not going that far for it, I have enough dumbasses to deal with around here. If you can be bothered to go that far, go ahead and write down the coords.
Catch yourself a little birdie to tell you interesting things...
Nah, I can't be fucked, either, I'd leave it behind even if I were close by.
Calm down, dumbass...
Hey guys! What's everyone babbling about?
Hey, yourself, victim. Borov said to leave you be, but don't go looking for problems around here.
It's so boring without vodka... You know, it's supper time in prison right now, they're serving macaroni!
Don't jinx anyone, just focus on pouring drinks for the guys...
Fuck off, I don't drink with just anyone.
Go fuck yourself then!
Alright, bros. Cheers!
Sure, gonna talk with Borov first and then pour us a couple.
Mmmm, respect! Should have said so right away...
Hear anything new, an-n-ything interesting lately?

New? Yesterday me and the guys pinned down three dutyers. One minute they're lounging around all cool on their posts and the next thing you know they're begging: "guys, don't do it, you don't have to kill us"... "I'll show you a stash instead"... A stash, sure, think they can just bullshit us, quietly slink away, and then roll in with their whole gang? Heh... And he goes: "the stash is really close", what a dumbass, huh? Ah, fuck all this... This stash of his... Hang on... Oh! There it is! Imagine that...
New? What could possibly be new here? Shit's all the same.
Ha, it takes half a day to get there. They were definitely bullshitting.
See ya. Stop by when you have a forty.
Whoa! Who's this I'm seeing! How long's it been?
Get lost, don't you see I'm tired after yesterday...
Let's get your health fixed up then...
We're out of everything. Ran out yesterday. Totally fucking empty.
Fuck off, I don't drink with just anyone.
Go fuck yourself then!
I always keep a little stashed away for health reasons. Bottoms up!
Opa... I'm dry as of late, too.
Da-a-amn, that's generous of you...
What's the word around here? Any places that still have loot around?

You bet! But keep your voice down. I recently saw some of Borov's lackeys hiding away a stash. I'm not about to grab it myself, we're strict about that around here, you're risking to wake up with a knife in your back, but if you sneak in and out, no one will suspect a thing. And stop by again when you're around, we'll discuss a couple other things. Alright?
Borov's got all the profitable places for himself, we get scraps...
You got it!
Alright, I'm off, bye.
Hey, bro... How goes it?
Not bad, I guess. You wanted something, or?
Not really...It's so quiet out here, I'm thinking, why not sit down and have a drink to boost our health a little.
Health is important, pour me one, I suppose.
I've got no problems with my health, I'm not drinking today.
Suit yourself.
Alright, just a small drink.
If only someone poured me one...
It's strong... Damn... Some salo would be great.
Yeah... Hits goo-o-od... Any chance you know anything interesting?

Not long ago Wolf and I were pulling a stalker out of an anomaly... Rather, what was left of him... Yeah... He had a note with some coordinates on him. Supposedly that's where his stash is... But Wolf said to stay clear of that place. Here's the coordinates, write them down, and tell me later if it was anything interesting. Deal?
Nope, I've not been around for long, haven't been far yet... Stop by in a week, maybe I'll find something out by then.
Alright... I'll check it out...
Alright, we'll talk more when I have free time.
Hey, how's the stalker's life?
Hey, Marked One... It's...okay. Going slowly, but surely.
Perhaps a splash of vodka would do it? To boost your health.
That would be great! Share some, if you're so charitable.
I've got no problems with my health, I'm not drinking today.
Suit yourself.
There we go, a hundred-fifty grams each, for bravery...
Hang on, I just need to see Sid first...
Damn... (cough cough) What do they brew this out of? Old furniture wood? Nearly barfed it all back out...
Out here, you never know, it could be anything... Got anything interesting to tell?

A couple stalkers came to see Sid not long ago... I was asleep nearby. Well, not exactly asleep - with one eye open, rather... They wanted to buy some of his equipment, on credit, so to speak... They told him about a stash with great loot, they even described the place... But Sid didn't sell them anything, what a tightwad, huh? I thought I'd go look, but can't quite get it together yet. Here's the place, see? If you find anything, don't forget about me, alright?
What can I say... This is the Zone, I wouldn't mind getting out of here.
If it's anything worthwhile, I won't forget.
We'll get out of here, some day...
Why are you so glum?.. Need any help, maybe?
What's there to be happy about? It's so dull around here, almost makes you wanna shove your head in a noose.
In that case, let's have a drink. Not to get drunk, but to improve the mood...
A-a-a-h, sure! Maybe it'll help...
My mood's fine, I'm not drinking today...
Suit yourself.
There... Hold it steady... To HOPE!
No way! I remember for sure I had a bottle... Now it's GONE!
To good old hope... Thank you, looks like there's still decent men around.
I hear that you can find some loot nearby, know anything about that?
Yeah, they're saying there's a stash with some loot, and not too far from here... But no one that went to check it out came back. Let me show you on the map: right here...
Nope, haven't heard... I don't really keep an ear out for rumors.
I'm not going out of my way for it, but I'll check it out if I happen to be nearby.
All the better. The less you know - the better you sleep...
Hey, friend... Can we talk?
Hey... What's this about?
Let's sit down for a bit, chat over some good refreshments...
The food's on me, pour us some, what're you waiting for?
I don't have time to talk, going on a raid soon...
Suit yourself.
There she is, my dearest, clear as a teardrop!
We have food, sure... But nothing to drink...
Whoo-oh, that's good! Hits you right down to the ass! Good stuff!
I hear ya... Anything going on in the Zone?

Day before yesterday, I was sitting around with some army soldiers, emptied a few bottles with them... They come here pretty often from Agroprom, Sid supplies them with vodka. They talked about how they caught a zombified stalker and, well, as you can imagine, he's all mumbling and moaning and grabbing for his rifle. The commander ordered to take him alive, send him to the eggheads outside of the Zone - for experiments, yeah... If you ask me, better to put a bullet through his head and get it over with... What was I on about? Oh yeah, so, this zombie had a drawing on his arm, like a tattoo, but not a real one, more like someone carved it out with a knife... Like a map or something. Their commander checked it for clues and it seems that there's a stash with loot not far from here. Approximately here...
Lots of things going on, with anomalies, with monsters, too much to talk about in one go. Stop by later, we'll talk more...
Yeah, better to go out quick... without suffering...
I'll stop by, we'll talk.
Hey, bratan. How are things around here?
Mutants tend to mess with us sometimes... Otherwise I guess things are alright.
Care to grab a drink? To becoming acquainted? Or does brass not allow it?
What brass? Our warrant officer, Prapor, served before, he understands that you can't go without it in the Zone. So don't worry, pour us some.
Brass has nothing to do with it, I'm just not in the mood...
Suit yourself.
Well then! To good people!..
I'd pour you one, but I used up my last forty for health reasons.
To us, that is! Eat something with it, here's some sausage.
Thank you... What's the word around here? Any news, maybe?

No unusual news. But you hear about Max Liuber? Bandits from Dark Valley caught him and his friend... Bullet - Liuber's friend - followed their trail... But before that he said that Max's friend shared some info about a map with pointers to a place with some hidden loot... Here! Bullet tried to ask someone to go get it, but brass wouldn't allow it, saying there's already too few fighters left on the post. Anyway, here's the place, take what's in there so bandits don't get to it instead.
Don't think I've heard anything unusual, just the same old...
Fine, I'll take it.
Well, buh-bye, see you later.
Greetings, soldier!
Hey, yourself... Where'd you come from?
Me, I'm just slowly exploring the Zone... How about a hundred grams?
Not a question! Two hundred grams never did anyone any harm...
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
Here, have two hundred and fifty, no appetizers.
Let me just haul some artefacts to Barkeep and I'll be back...
Hah, that hits pretty good... Why would I need appetizers for nectar like this...
That's true, wouldn't want to ruin a good thing... Tell me something interesting...

Bes visited a couple days ago, good man, even though he's a Loner... No offense, alright? We helped him out with some ammo, talked about this and that... He didn't have anything valuable on him, so he told us about a stash. Didn't have any loot in it, though, but it did seem like someone hides their goods there pretty often. Scout if out if you're feeling like it, see who it belongs to...
What's there to say? This is the Zone, and if not for us, this disease would have spread to the entire world by now.
I'll try to scout it out...
Well, see you later, savior of the world...
Hey, man, your face looks familiar, have we met before?
Who knows, I only remember the ones I'm friendly with.
Well, how about a drink, not to get drunk, but to friendship...
Well well, I think I might be recalling you after all... Sure, pour me one!
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
There... Hold it steady... To Friendship!
No way! I remember having a bottle! Now it's GONE!
To reliable friends! To those who'll watch your back even in the Zone!
I hear that you can find some loot nearby, know anything about that?

Didn't tell this to anyone, but I'll tell you, as a friend. There's some clues leading to a hidden spot... Accidentally found out about it. Maybe it's empty, but maybe it's got tons of loot. If you're a real friend, I assume you'll share?
No, haven't heard anything... Everyone's gathered up all the loot that's nearby, and only Strelok knows what's further up there...
Of course, what are you talking about! Anything for a friend...
Strelok? I see... I have a couple questions for him.
Hi, can we talk, if you don't mind?
Sure, sit if you want... What's up?
How's about a splash of vodka?
The snacks are on me, pour us some, what're you waiting for?
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
Keep the glasses steady so I don't pour over the edge.
We have snacks, sure... But nothing to drink...
Oo-o-of! That greased up the old gears.
Doesn't it get boring sitting around here all day?

Not really, what's there to be bored of? Barkeep sends over food as pay for guarding the place... Loners stop by often and share the latest news... And there's always things to shoot at. \nKhohma: The bandits have been getting bold lately, always setting up ambushes... For example, we had this happen: some guy's lying there, pretending to be a wounded stalker, sending SOS signals to every radio frequency, when suddenly a couple burers stumble upon him... This "wounded" guy, as soon as he hears their screams, jumps up and starts running without even looking where he's going. Runs right at us and hits the checkpoint gate - smack! There's noise, and fuss, and stench - this fan of easy money crapped himself so hard it got all up to his ears... Then he kept trembling and promising riches for everybody, saying he's got a stash hidden, and showed it on the map... What a weirdo, I swear... No one here's gonna risk their ass for some stash. We are a bulwark! Protecting the world from all this unnatural vermin! If you're interested, here's the note he gave us...
Sure, it gets boring, but at least you feel like you're part of a cause - protecting the World from unnatural vermin!
Good one... I'll take a look if I get the chance, but I think it's all bullshit.
Wouldn't want to distract a hero, then...
Hey, bro... How's life?
Fucking sick of bandits! They just keep coming! My nerves can't take much more!
Blow off some steam... Let's relax a little...
I'm not mad, just that we haven't had decent booze in a while... Pour me some, if you're offering...
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
Let's drink to tomorrow, to seeing another day at all!
I'm all out right now. Gotta see a trader, stock up...
Cheers! To death of old age!
There... That eases the burden a little... What's the word around here?

Everyone tries to keep their thoughts to themselves. This is the Zone, brother... But I did hear that a couple guys stashed away some of their things when returning from one of the military outposts... I thought of getting the stash myself, but doesn't seem likely anymore... So you can have it, if you want, get some use out of it before it disappears completely. A few days ago those guys I mentioned got killed during a bandit raid. A real shame, they were good stalkers, friends of ours...
Everyone tries to keep their thoughts to themselves. This is the Zone, brother... Even friends don't plan anything in advance... So no one gets jinxed...
Yeah... A lot of good people leave us...
That's for sure. Alright, friend, until tomorrow...
I heard shooting here, what was that about?
We're shooting to keep the enemies on their toes. And ourselves, too...
Let's grab two-fifty grams each, for bravery?
Yeah, pour me one!
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
Take two-fifty! To be sure!
Hold on a minute, I'll just look around first, see what the situation is...
Eugh! That's nasty. Strong, though...
Heh, what were you expecting? Lemonade? Hear about anything interesting?

Bes and his boys killed a dozen marauders near the swamp, then I went to check it out... Sure enough, wild animals did quite a number on the bodies, it was a grisly sight... I took a closer look and in the middle of all the slaughter I saw something shiny. Used a stick to take it out and it turned out to be a bottle, really small, about fifty grams, probably a souvenir. Mm-yeah... Seems like the guy swallowed it when he sensed danger. This bottle had a piece of paper in it, with a map to a stash inside. Here's the map, maybe you could reach the stash. I couldn't...
Everything's as usual, some guy died in an anomaly, another guy got shot, third guy just vanished without a trace... Such are our "interesting" news...
If I manage to reach it, half of it's yours.
Right then, keep it together... See you.
Hi, mind exchanging a couple words?
What's the point in standing around and yapping? Not unless it's something important...
Maybe we could grab a drink, to get acquainted? Doesn't sound too bad, right?
I don't have anything to drink... If you do, though, then let's see it, don't just run your mouth...
I don't want any right now. Not in the mood...
Suit yourself.
I sure do! Cheers, to kindred spirits!
Sorry, friend, I'm all out, too...
You talk too much... Drinking, just like living, should be done quietly...
Aren't you the philosopher! Well, go ahead then, enlighten me on how life should be lived...

Everyone lives their life according to themselves, and you can't learn to live another person's life... Take Lucky Lyovka, for instance, you've probably heard of him, right? Used to brag about how lucky he is, how women are into him, and how all the monsters steer clear of him... He didn't live for the present day, he hid away his things, planned out stashes. Couldn't convince him to grab a drink or unwind a little, he saved all his artefacts, didn't sell them to the local traders, thought he'd sell them outside the Zone and start rolling in the dough... And where is he now? Not even a lock of hair's left of him after he got dissolved in the "Jelly". Now a bunch of other "lucky" guys are looking for those stashes. If you ask me, nothing good can come out of the loot in them, and that loot is likely useless for people like me, who live only for today...
What's the point in englightening you? If you have a path in life, you follow it, if not - you won't just be handed one.
Maybe you're right, but I think one should prepare for the day ahead...
That's you destiny then, I suppose. But I believe in the human spirit...
How goes it, friend?
So far, so good. Bit boring, though...
Wanna grab a bit to drink? To improve the mood?
The bottle's on you, everything else is on me...
Nah, get lost...
Suit yourself.
I'm down for that! Get the glasses...
I have everything else too, but no bottle...
Damn, she's good! Burns the whole gut!
Tell me something interesting...

Something interesting? Hmm... What could I possibly lie about... Ah, whatever! Fine, I'll tell it as it is... You know Yurik? Scrawny newbie, tried to tag along with seasoned stalkers to go looking for loot. He was a lightweight on the booze too, drinks a sip but acts like he downed an entire bucket. Sat around with us yesterday, ran his mouth... Got all revved up saying he's gonna one-up the seasoned stalkers because he knows where some impressive stash is hidden. We laughed at him, but he started pointing at the screen of his PDA, where the stash is marked on the map. No one believed him, of course, where does a snot-nosed coward from Cordon like him know such info... Allegedly, there's some stash right there... Would you believe him?
I'm so exhausted I can barely turn my tongue, I can tell you something tomorrow...
Nah, I wouldn't believe that. Yurik is one hell of a liar.
Until tomorrow then, friend...
Hi, how are things around here?

It's fun around here, if you want you can head to the Bar, or chat around with dutyers, or place bets at the arena. A lot of rumors floating around, the Bar's almost at the center of the Zone, after all...
How about taking a drink? To getting acquainted.
Not a bad idea... Pour us some, we'll go to the arena afterwards for some excitement, tickle our nerves so to speak...
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
Cheers, to keeping our spirits high!
I'll run to the 100 Rads bar for a bottle... Wait here!
Go on, then...
Any rumors floating around? Anyone saying anything interesting?

Lots of things, I guess... Supposedly there's a teleporter that leads straight to the Monolith, though I've heard that about at least ten different locations. A new type of monster showed up - hits you with electricity, now that's some shit... Duty and Freedom are still fighting over the Zone, all you ever hear is about how one faction killed the other, or the other way around, but what is there to fight over and try to divide up? There's enough of the Zone for everyone... Not long ago they caught a freedomer and took him into their basement to re-educate him. Some psychiatrists... Well that freedomer tossed something into the bushes, later I went and looked, found his PDA, and it had stash coordinates. Here. Let's go together, see what's in it? I think it's located around here...
Come to the Bar later in the evening, our guys are gonna gather up, we can sit and have a chat... You can hear plenty of interesting things, just don't forget to keep the booze flowing...
That's pretty far, I'm going the opposite way right now...
Alright, I'll come by.
Hey, man. How's life?
Bursting with excitement... More like my head is about to burst... What do you want?
What're you so angry about? Let's have a drink to improve the mood?
I'm sick of everything! Let's drink...
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
Hey! Screw everything! Bottoms up!
Better if I leave you be...
Well, alright. At least they still haven't forgotten how to make decent vodka.
Yep, clear like a Komsomol member's teardrop... What are you sick of, anyway?

No one but assholes around... You mean people well, and they smear you in shit in return. I found this stash, thought I'd take this one asshole with me so someone would cover my back. But this pest quietly fucked off, and stole everything from my backpack... Ugh... Some people... Assholes! Maybe you could get ahead of him? Here's where the stash is...
There's plenty of douchebags around, that's for sure, can't trust anyone... All they want is to fuck with you.
I'll see if I can. I'll try to restore your faith in people.
You're an angry guy, I'm leaving.
Hey, bratan, have we met before?
Your face looks familiar too, I think, what's-your-name?
Call me Marked One, everyone does...
Okay, Marked One it is. So, a drink to becoming acquainted? Have any on you?
Alright, Marked One. I'd drink to becoming acquainted, but I'm not in the mood right now...
Suit yourself.
Sure do! Here! It's damn strong.
No, I don't have any... Had to trade my whole supply for ammunition...
Hah! It's strong, that's for sure! Well then, Marked One my brother, seems like there's now two more good people in the Zone.
I hear that you can find some loot nearby, know anything about that?

Well, since you're a good person, and good people should help each other, I'll tell you this, Marked One... Zombies have been stumbling into the base pretty often as of late, there's a mystery for you - all the entrances to the base are guarded by Duty, not even a mouse can slink past, but these things keep showing up anyway. They're always mumbling something, stretching their arms out... It's creepy! Last night I was relaxing all cultured-like - Barman, the bastard, won't let me put my drinks on credit anymore, what a cheapskate, huh? Anyway, I started falling asleep, but felt something, some stench and a feeling of heaviness, I opened my eyes - and there he is, our pal the walking corpse. I froze in place, couldn't move my arms or legs... Not out of fear, of course, just out of surprise... And the dead guy mumbled something, I tried to make it out and heard numbers, the same thing repeated over and over. I closed my eyes, then opened them - and he was gone... Only the stench remained. And the numbers kept repeating in my head, so I checked them out - they looked like coordinates. But it's pretty far from here... So that's how the story goes, bro.
All the easy to reach places have already been looted... You have to go towards the center of the Zone, they say that's where the Klondike is.
Sounds like you might've had some bad bootleg vodka, where'd you get it?
Klondike, you say? Yeah, sure...
Why so sad, friend?

Well, just thinking I gotta leave the Zone... It gets worse and worse every day. The monsters are getting more dangerous and angry, the weather is shit, anomalies everywhere, and worst of it all - people are turning into animals...
Alright, forget about that! Let's have a drink instead...
Okay, let's, but is there anything to drink?
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
I wouldn't have offered if I didn't have any...
Ah, hell! I swear I had a bottle! Must have been stolen!
Err, it's not Chardonnay, but it's not bad either!
Why don't you go looking for artefacts?

It's a long story... You in a hurry? I had a friend, Seryoga Earless, we used to go to dangerous raids together all the time... One time we got all the way to the Brain Scorcher, saw those phantoms out there, and that's not all... \nPour me a bit more... Ye-a-ah, Seryoga... His ear got shot off in Chechnya, hence the nickname. Can't count how many times we've covered each other's backs... On our last raid we stumbled on a pseudogiant, it's not the most dangerous creature if you don't face it head-on like an idiot. But it just so happens, the beast slams its hand on the ground and Seryoga gets thrown back, well, no further than half a meter, and lands with his entire body straight into the "Jelly"... His face, and hands... Everything... Meat was sliding off his skull... And he was conscious, too... Pour me some more, my soul's burning up... I abandoned him there... And I left my soul there, too. We left a stash there, but I won't take it, I don't want to... If you find it, pay your respects to Seryoga.
I can't... The Zone broke me... Another day or two and I'll start preparing to leave...
I will if I find it...
That's probably for the best... I think...
Hello, can we talk?
Hello, why not? I see you're not one of those shitheads...
No, I'm not one of them... Let's grab a hundred grams each?
Hmm... Not a bad thought... Pour me some...
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
Cheers, to getting acquainted...
Damn, I'm all out...
To getting acquainted... Whew, where'd you find this... This is some nasty crap...
It's not Smirnoff, that's for sure! What's the word in the Zone?

Well, I've heard some things here and there... Allegedly there's some great stashes left over from stalkers that died. There's hidden faction stashes, but I haven't heard of anyone finding one. I found a PDA completely by accident, and a stash is marked on its map, I can share it with you... I'm not likely to go there myself...
Come to the Bar later in the evening, our guys are gonna gather up, we can sit and have a chat... You can hear plenty of interesting things, just don't forget to keep the booze flowing...
Thanks, I'll check it out if I'm ever nearby.
Alright, I'll come by.
Hey, man. How's life?
Bursting with excitement...More like my head is about to burst... What do you want?
What're you so angry about? Let's have a drink to improve the mood?
I'm sick of everything! Let's drink...
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
Hey! Screw everything! Bottoms up!
Better if I leave you be...
Well, alright. At least they still haven't forgotten how to make decent vodka.
Yep, clear like a Komsomol member's teardrop... What are you sick of, anyway?

No one but assholes around... You mean people well, and they smear you in shit in return. I found this stash, thought I'd take this one asshole with me so someone would cover my back. But this pest quietly fucked off, and stole everything from my backpack... Ugh... Some people... Assholes! Maybe you could get ahead of him? Here's where the stash is...
There's enough douchebags around, that's for sure, can't trust anyone... All they want is to fuck with you.
I'll see if I can. I'll try to restore your faith in people.
You're an angry guy, I'm leaving.
Hey, bratan, have we met before?
Your face looks familiar too, I think, what's-your-name?
Call me Marked One, everyone does...
Okay, Marked One it is. So, a drink to becoming acquainted? Have any on you?
Alright, Marked One. I'd drink to becoming acquainted, but I'm not in the mood right now...
Suit yourself.
Sure do! Here! Strong like a sailor's cursing...
No, I don't have any... Had to trade my whole supply for ammunition...
Hah! It's strong, that's for sure! Well then, Marked One my brother, seems like there's now two more good people in the Zone.
I hear that you can find some loot nearby, know anything about that?

I was in Yantar not long ago, figured I'd check out what the eggheads are up to... Didn't go too far, my brain wouldn't really handle it... Saw those poor bastards out there - the zombified stalkers. They shoot like Voroshilov sharpshooters, though! How's that even possible? Their brains don't work anymore, right? One of them was lying on the ground nearly dead so I tried to search him and then - oh man! Some gross crap squirts out of him, I nearly died from the poison... Anyway, he had a map to a stash on him... I won't risk going there, but I can share it with you.
All the easy to reach places have already been looted... You have to go towards the center of the Zone, they say that's where the Klondike is.
Alright, I'll risk it!..
Klondike, you say? Yeah, sure...
Why so sad, friend?

Well, just thinking I gotta leave the Zone... It gets worse and worse every day. The monsters are getting more dangerous and angry, the weather is shit, anomalies everywhere, and worst of it all - people are turning into animals...
Alright, forget about that! Let's have a drink instead...
Okay, let's, but is there anything to drink?
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
I wouldn't have offered if I didn't have any...
Ah, hell! I swear I had a bottle! Must have been stolen!
Err, it's not Chardonnay, but it's not bad either!
Why don't you go looking for artefacts?

It's a long story... You in a hurry? I had a friend, Seryoga Earless, used to go to dangerous raids together all the time... One time we got all the way to the Brain Scorcher, saw those phantoms out there, and that's not all... \nPour me a bit more... Ye-a-ah, Seryoga... His ear got shot off in Chechnya, hence the nickname. Can't count how many times we've covered each other's backs... On our last raid we stumbled on a pseudogiant, it's not the most dangerous creature if you don't face it head-on like an idiot. But it just so happens, the beast slams its hand on the ground and Seryoga gets thrown back, well, no further than half a meter, and lands with his entire body straight into the "Jelly"... His face, and hands... Everything... Meat was sliding off his skull... And he was conscious, too... Pour me some more, my soul's burning up... I abandoned him there... And I left my soul there, too. We left a stash there, but I won't take it, I don't want to... If you find it, pay your respects to Seryoga.
I can't... The Zone broke me... Another day or two and I'll start preparing to leave...
I will if I find it...
That's probably for the best... I think...
Heya, bratan. How goes it?
Couldn't be better... We got some crazy grass delivered not long ago, I was in a whole other world for 3 straight days... Too bad we ran out of it now...
Well... Yeah... That sucks. How about a hundred grams instead?
What kinda question is that?! You got any?
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
I always have some for an occasion like this!
That's the problem, I don't have any...
(sigh) It vanished, and I didn't even notice.

Did you hear? Couple days ago some stalker showed up at the Bar, saying he emptied out some important merc's stash. He was all happy, telling everyone about how he picked up the merc's PDA somewhere around here at the Warehouses... The next day he disappeared and no one's seen him since then, seems like the mercs might have disposed of him... So there's that.

It's all the same old shit... We shoo these mercs around like they're cockroaches. On the other hand, we arranged this raid on the Duty base, it turned into a real war - it was pretty terrifying, but we couldn't break through because an emission started right then, a strong one, too... My brain started melting and I stumbled over some dutyer's corpse, got a glimpse of his PDA, and quickly grabbed it... We had to hold out over at the Wild Territory... Ended up bunkering down in some garage until the emission ended... When we returned to our base, I inspected the PDA and found a mark to a stash on the map, ri-i-igh here. I didn't have time to check it, so you can have it, here you go...
Screw him. Shouldn't have been showing off. Maybe then he would've lived longer. Anyway, I'm getting kinda sleepy... Come back later!
Right... I'll check it out sometime, thanks. See you later...
I'll stop by, don't doubt it.
Heya, friend! How's life?
Kinda crappy, no one wants to join and reinforce our ranks... Maybe you wanna join in? Life would get a bit calmer if you did...
Well, I might be considering it... How about we share a bottle, to getting to know one another?
(sigh) If only there were more generous people like you... I just so happen to have half a kilo of sausage saved for just such an occasion. Get the elixir out!
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
There she is, authentic Ukrainian "Cossacks". Hold the glass!
I was ju-ust about to pay Screw a visit, hang on, if he has any left, I'll borrow some.
Brrr... My liver won't be happy... But you get points in my book!
So, friend? (hic)... What's ha-happening around here anyway?

Well, not long ago Lukash requested that someone check the Barrier... Said there's some trouble... So I grab those monkeys that are sitting by the campfire, there, see em? So we go to the barrier and there's a massive zombie attack going on! 50 or something of them... We only lost our sniper, even though I thought all of us would be put down. The zombified are lively bastards, want it or not, you have to go and finish them off... So I approached one of them, and he started mumbling some numbers over and over, so I "helped" the poor fella out and put him out of his misery. When I got back, I realized that the numbers were coordinates, but for what? They point right here...

What's there to happen at our place? Oh yeah, we got a new plan brought it recently - crazy stuff! If you wanna buy, go see Chef, he knows where to find it. And you should stop by more often for a chat.
Those zombies are always mumbling something. Don't pay too much attention.
Well, til next time! I've gotta go.
Hey, guys! Mind if I join?
Heya, Marked One! Move over, guys, give some space over to a respectable stalker.
Thank you for the hospitality. How about a drink?
Now that's what I'm talking about! We've got some shashlyk going on the fire just for that! So, where's the good stuff?
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
I've always got some on me. Here!
Where'd I put it?.. Must've lost it somewhere... Wait, I'll just run over to Bootlegger.
Brrr... Where'd you get this? Tell me the place - I'll start buying from nowhere but there from now on!
Yeah... You said it, it's one of the best ones that I ever drank! I found it in a stash nearby...

Listen, maybe it's our Bootlegger that hid it away for a special occasion? We were drinking together once and he accidentally let slip that he tends to go relax and blow off some steam ri-i-ight here. He's our tasting specialist, you see! How about you go check it out? Then we can continue the banquet!
Too bad, I would have bought crates of that vodka, great stuff! Well, if you have any more - stop by!
Yeah... Your Bootlegger guy's probably a champion drinker in the Zone... Well, see you...
Of course I'll stop by... Well, good luck!
Hi! What got you all upset?
Hi, Marked One. How else am I supposed to feel? There's no artefacts, no women, no vodka...
That's where you're wrong... I've got a forty lying around here somewhere...
Why didn't you say so right away? Make yourself comfortable, share what's in that backpack of yours. I've got a couple glasses just here.
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
Now where'd I put it? Ah, there it is, right at the bottom! Let's drink, to women, and to artefacts!
Where is... where'd I?... Wait here a minute, I'll run over to this one place, and then we'll have something to boost our health with.
You've got one hell of an arsenal... More impressive than ours... The glasses are too small. Well, let's drink to the ladies!
Cheers! Who-oh, hits goods! What's the word around here?

Well, not long ago a group was sent out, myself included, to the Dark Valley, to scout out any possible direct paths from there to the Warehouses. You must understand, we're caged up in here - Duty on one side, and the Brain Scorcher on the other. Anyway, we're out late in the evening and suddenly we see this image: some bandit out in the distance running around faster than a bullet... well, we get confused to say the least. Seems like he noticed us and changed direction, our jaws dropped and we're thinking, who's this Rambo? Then our sharp-eyed guy Roman tells us: "He's not running around there alone", Roman had night vission goggles on, you see. We take a closer look, and he's right... the air behind the bandit looks all distorted. He runs closer towards us by like 20 meters, and then we realize that shit's real bad - there's 4 bloodsuckers behind him! We had to put everyone down, including the bandit. He must have been just some lackey. We found a mark on his map's PDA, right here, without any notes or anything. The poor bandit bastard's pants were all brown - one hell of a mess. But I imagine anyone would have shat himself in his place.
You can always hear screaming not too far away in the distance. Fucking scary. But if you're looking for anything specific, I don't really keep up with what goes on here.
That guy sure didn't have the luckiest of days. Well, one more drink, and then I have to get going.
Sure, one more, and I'm going to bed, so tired today...
Hi, guys!
Don't scream like that, this place is horrifying... it doesn't like being treated with disrespect. Stop prancing around so much, sit down. What'd you want?
Just thought I'd grab a drink with some decent men.
Well, that wouldn't hurt, since we've frozen our asses off by now.
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
Here, have some.
Actually, guys, I was hoping you'd be the ones treating me. Alright then, I'll run to the base and grab a bottle.

Respect for not letting us die of the cold... We're just sitting here, waiting for our guys... Waiting... They went to the village to clear out the bloodsucker lair... Seems like we won't be seeing them again... A real shame about the guys...
Mm-hm, even the hair on my ass is standing on end. Even vodka isn't helping the fear.

Oh, you touched upon on a sacred subject. So many legends are told about this place. Before the emission in 2006 this village used to look like the rookie village at Cordon, and my brother lived here. Everything was so quiet and peaceful... Until an emission hit so hard that barely anyone survived... Everyone was screaming... Waves of mutants rushed in from the direction of the Barrier, one after another. The emission lasted 10-15 minutes, but it seemed like a whole 3 hours, many people lost their friends then, and the next day we were sent to retrieve the dead and bury them, but we would have done that even without anyone asking us to. I found my brother... My own brother, he was lying in a basement, it was a pitiful sight. I took his weapon, look how shiny it still is, and his PDA. His PDA had only one mark on its map, right here, and a note that was addressed to me, but that's personal.

Lots of things happen around here... Either way, don't come here too often - this place is a real zoo of the Zone. There's bloodsuckers, and burers, and controllers, and dogs, and even chimeras come visit once in a while...
Damn, my condolences. Well, let's grab one last drink, I've got plenty of work to do.
Thanks for the tip, but we'll see each other again.
Hey, friend. Got any chow?
I do, what of it?
And do you have any drinks?
That's a no.
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
There, see? What would we do without each other? We've already got a picnic going here... here's your glass! What shall we drink to?
That's a shame, I don't have any either.
Teamwork, that's for sure. Let's drink to there always being people like you, and to them always finding people like me! Well, cheers! Oo-of, that's strong!
You said it... Burns a little! Hey, maybe you know something I don't?

Well, bratan, you've probably been all over the Zone yourself, no? Do you know anything about the Dead City? No? That's where the Mercenaries' main base is. They took me hostage about half a year ago. Everything was by the killers' rules - bag on your head, pistolwhipped to the head, and they're driving me in an unknown direction... They brought me in and started interrogating me on how to quietly get into our base... I didn't tell them anything, of course. They left me in a cage overnight. There were two other guys next to me. One of them reminded me of you, by the way... We talked about how to escape, and all that. I noticed there was some map of the Zone at their base... with some dots on them, I can only remember one of them now: I think it was around here somewhere... then they dragged me out and hit me over the head with a pistol again and I woke up in the car with a hood over my head. They pushed me out of the car and told me to stand at the edge of a cliff, saying, like, what's your last wish and all... and then, to my luck, an emission starts... I had to jump. It turned out to be some swamp, and in the middle of the swamp was an old train wagon, so I waited there for the emission to end. Turns out they brought me to Agroprom... I barely got home... Told everyone here - no one believed me because I was drunk when I told them, but you understand, how couldn't I be, after surviving that...
Oh, how would I know? I'm here all day, they stationed me here a week ago, so I haven't seen anything interesting. Come back later, maybe I'll find something out.
Interesting, it's a miracle that you survived. Farewell.
Okay, I'll stop by sometime. See you later.
Why are you so pale?
It's so damn cold...
Why don't you get warmed up?
If only I had something to get warmed up with...
Not feeling like it today...
Suit yourself.
I'll help you out with that! Here! What shall we drink to?
And here I am freezing... Wondering if anyone would help me get warm.
Let's drink to there being something to drink tomorrow! Oo-of, it's strong. Here, eat some sausage along with it.
Thanks. Listen, where does one find loot around here?

Everyone's got trouble with that right now. They say there's loot behind the barrier, but it's dangerous to stick your head in there. I'm speaking from experience - I was broke and owed a lot of people, so circumstances forced me to head to the Barrier. So I went... nothing around me but silence... then I saw something moving in front of me so I hid behind a rock. I tripped and fell, and ended up face to face with an old acquaintance of mine who disappeared long ago, except by then he was halfway decomposed. Makes me wanna barf when I remember it. He was an authoritative stalker, had himself an AS-VAL. I took his backpack, figured he doesn't need it anymore. Just as I got up I saw Monolith soldiers talking to the zombified... Droning on to them: "In the name of the Monolith...", so I ran the opposite way... and literally half an hour later we're fighting off fifty or so zombies. So there you have it. I found a couple stashes on the PDA, here and here. I cleared this one out on my way back, but I was too lazy to get the second one, plus I had no more room, and I've never even been to that area before.
They're saying there used to be piles of artefacts at the Agroprom, but I don't know if that's still the case... Alright, Marked One, stop by, if anything.
You got lucky. I advise that you don't go for stunts like that again. Look alive. See you later.
Okay, I'll stop by sometime.
